title: Ep. 83: 'Atlanta' and 'Luke Cage' Re-up
description:
The Ringer's Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald discuss shifting plot points and character development on 'Atlanta' (6:00), the conservative 'Luke Cage' (16:00), and Netflix's expanded universe (34:00). 
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
